mapper.sql: ID, CREATED_TIME, CREATOR, CREATOR_ID, LAST_UPDATE_ID, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATER, `NAME`, PHONE, ACCOUNT, `PASSWORD`, USER_STATE, ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, PARENT_ID, COMPANY_ID, MEMBER_LEVEL, COMPANY_LEVEL, BALANCE, CUMULATIVE_PROFIT, CUMULATIVE_POINT, DELETED, OPEN_ID, INVITE_CODE, HEAD_URL, SPARE4, SPARE5
mapper.update:
update points_alliance.sys_user
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime},
CREATOR = #{creator},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId},
LAST_UPDATE_ID = #{lastUpdateId},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime},
LAST_UPDATER = #{lastUpdater},
NAME = #{name},
PHONE = #{phone},
ACCOUNT = #{account},
PASSWORD = #{password},
USER_STATE = #{userState},
ROLE_ID = #{roleId},
ROLE_NAME = #{roleName},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId},
MEMBER_LEVEL = #{memberLevel},
COMPANY_LEVEL = #{companyLevel},
BALANCE = #{balance},
CUMULATIVE_PROFIT = #{cumulativeProfit},
CUMULATIVE_POINT = #{cumulativePoint},
DELETED = #{deleted},
OPEN_ID = #{openId},
INVITE_CODE = #{inviteCode},
HEAD_URL = #{headUrl},
SPARE4 = #{spare4},
SPARE5 = #{spare5},
where ID = #{id}
mapper.delete:
update points_alliance.sys_user set DELETED = 1, LAST_UPDATE_ID = #{updateId}, LAST_UPDATER = #{updater}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{dateTime} where ID in
#{id}
